bug.author: myungjoo
bug.summary: [NR5] Handle subplugin not found error gracefully.
bug.description: Dont' do SIGSEGV. Emit legit error messages and die gracefully. (both decoder and filter subplugin)

comments.comment: : Thank you for posting issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nnstreamer/nnstreamer/issues/1092>#1092</denchmark-link> . The person in charge will reply soon.
